channel.title: New additions to the staff team
channel.description:
We are happy to announce the addition of two new staff members to our moderation team. Please welcome [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=327759]TabbyKiller[/url] and [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=567674]Null Amount[/url]! TabbyKiller shall be moderating the General Discussion section while Null Amount will be moderating the Client Help section.
We would also like to announce that amy_webb shall be moderating the General Discussion section and Development Teams section on top of her current section.
You may find a list of our current staff team [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,338737.0.html]here[/url].

item.title: New additions to the staff team
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Yz85Racer:

this forum has been dead for years, just like the souls of everyone who visits it

Abandon all hope for ye who read this post

Read full topic

item.title: New additions to the staff team
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“dawsonsmokes, post:18, topic:534121”][quote author=Travas link=topic=652920.msg4375176#msg4375176 date=1381874114]
I don’t get why you’re trying to say mopar is dying because it has only 35 registered users online.
[/quote]

R-s has over 350+ atm lol. Big difference. Like 10x more lolol let’s take this to pm though. If anything. No need to be spamming.[/quote]So that means we are dying? Just because we do not compare to another RSPS site doesn’t mean we are dead. (if that’s the case, we died a long time ago)

Read full topic

[/quote]

R-s has over 350+ atm lol. Big difference. Like 10x more lolol let’s take this to pm though. If anything. No need to be spamming.[/quote]but mopar wins++; and it has a client, wins++;, and like the forum layour, wins++;

item.description:
@dawsonsmokes wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:15, topic:534121”][quote author=dawsonsmokes link=topic=652920.msg4375156#msg4375156 date=1381868977]
OT: Is it just me or is mopar dying with their 20-40 members online :eek:
[/quote]you must be new here

Congratulations guys. :)[/quote]

Hope they make the best of it.

Off topic:

Users Online
Users Online
157 Guests, 35 Users (0 Buddies), 192 Total
Users active in past 15 minutes:

That tells me different. The guests are usually from google bots just saying :fp:

item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:3, topic:534121”]That’s a bit harsh :\ Giving someone sectional over client help is like giving someone a water treatment job in Africa. No work to be done. xD Haha nah but grats both of you[/quote]I’m sure something will come up eventually. Thanks :o

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:4, topic:534121”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=652920.msg4374855#msg4374855 date=1381792270]
That’s a bit harsh :\ Giving someone sectional over client help is like giving someone a water treatment job in Africa. No work to be done. xD Haha nah but grats both of you
[/quote]
This is exactly what I said to myself while reading.

Congratulations though. Especially my main boo N_A :3[/quote]Thanks Frank

Read full topic
